# @repo/hindsight-js

<!-- AI-generated by Claude Opus 4.5 -->

A JavaScript/TypeScript port of the Hindsight API, designed to
run with PGLite for browser and edge environments.

## Overview

This package is a faithful port of the Python Hindsight API,
maintaining test parity with the original implementation.

## Development

Tests are ported from the original Python test suite located
in `docs-local/hindsight-api-tests/`.

```bash
# Run tests
bun test

# Run tests in watch mode
bun test:watch

# Type check
bun typecheck
```
